_header: A hende knight hight Placidas / But a heathen man
_description: Legend of St. Eustace, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A Hende knight hight placidasBot haythen man full lange he
                    was…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Amen Amen i rede we saieffor þare es ioye lastis
                    aie
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
AN heþene kniht hihte PlacidasBut heþene Mon longe he
                    was…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…AMEN I rede þat we sayffor now is ende of þis
                    play
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 262-72.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Als it bifell in olde daweOf a knyght þat lifed in hethen
                    lawe…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And are in heuene with ioy and gleGod gif vs grace we may so
                    be

CULDd11.First Lines:
An hende knyht highte Placidasan hethene man longe he
                    was…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we alle sayfor þer is non ende of þat
                    play
CULDd11.Note:
Break between preceding (3051) and this (62) occurs four
                    lines earlier in this MS, beginning, ‘And þat be a knyht I may
                    ȝou schawe…’ (f. 91v).

CULGg531.First Lines:
A hend knyght hyght placidasBot hethen man full lang he
                    was…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And bryng vs tyll þat mekyll blysÞer ay ys ioye
                    with owt mys

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Ane hende knyght hyght placidasbot hathyne man full lang he
                    was…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…Amen amen I rede we sayfor bes nane endyng of þat
                    play
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit vita et passio sancti Eutacii sociorumque eius (f.
                    40)

HunHM129.First Lines:
A hendy knyght heght placydasBot hethyn man ful lange he
                    was…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede þat we all sayffor þare is no endynge
                    of þat play
